name: Jergens Natural Glow Instant Sun Body Mousse, Self Tanner for Light Bronze Tan, Sunless Tanning Body Bronzer, Fake Tan for Fair to Medium Skin, 6 Ounce
about_this_item: FLAWLESS SELF TANNER - Create a flawless, quick tan with gradual, natural-looking color for gorgeous skin and blended color for fair to medium skin.
INSTANT SUNLESS TANNING - Lightweight, airy tanning mousse enhances your natural skin tone to mimic results from the sun.
NATURAL BODY BRONZER - Develop your tone instantly, and watch it deepen within hours of application for steak-free results. Use the next day for deeper color.
TROPICAL, FRUITY SCENT - Jergens Natural Glow Mousse gives you an island escape with its tropical, fruity fragrance.
EASY, FAST-DRYING APPLICATION - Applied by hand or sunless tanning mitt, our self tanning mousse is tinted for precise application, and it dries in just 60 seconds.

title: The best!!
content: I have tried other self tanners, but there is always something wrong with them. This is now my go to. It doesn’t smell funky and gives a nice tan color!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Jergens self-tanning deep colored mousse is a great way to get a nice looking natural looking tan for a fraction of the cost of going to tanning beds. It goes on very smoothly with a pleasant fragrance and the tan last for about 1 week. I highly recommend this product for anyone that would like a natural looking tan.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2024

title: Jergens self-tanning mouse. Deep color.
content: Be sure to read somewhere about how to keep from getting big brown spots. Put it on in daylight, so you don’t over do it. Exfoliate!! Put body cream on dry spots so knees, etc , don’t over-tan. Takes. Some practice. Doesn’t smell. If you put On a ton, it will come off on your clothes.

post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Downside to this product, however, I've found that about after a week & 1/2 to 2 weeks you can expect to see the product beginning to become splotchy and spotted throughout the skin... With time, of course, we are expecting the product to "fade away' or rinse off even with frequent showers/ bathing.... Its just the way it unevenly disperses through out the skin and leaves almost like a stain in your pores- is the only slight annoyance I have found... That is definitely the downside though ... lol... I would say the initial results of the rich caramelly tan are definitely worth it - to me at least! Just some things you may want to be aware of before you dive into this sunless tanning mousse.  All  in all it's an amazing product and fading is obviously expected with any sunless tanning product! 😊😊😊
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2021

title: This looks good even on fair skin.
content: People, I am pale. My legs are nearly neon. So I figured something must be wrong with this product when I used it four days in a row and became no tanner than when I started; I was still blinded by the glare coming off my lower body. I figured it must be user error, so I tried it with lotion, without lotion, with a tanning mitt, without a tanning mitt, after shaving, after not shaving, blah blah blah. I could barely see it as I was applying it, and the scent was almost non-existent. At first I figured it's simply an ineffective product, but I couldn't get why so many reviewers on here gave it high ratings. So I bought the same exact item at Target, and guess what, folks? Works great. It's a totally different color right out of the bottle--the Target one is more of a brown/red, whereas the Amazon one is yellow/gold. The Target one has a stronger smell, and I can see it everywhere I apply it. The Amazon one is clearly fake. Too bad I discovered this after the return window closed. Add it to the list of counterfeit trash I've been sent by Amazon recently.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: As for the product, I haven't yet managed to figure out how to apply it uniformly; It's still a little patchy, even when I rub it in well with my mitt. The self-tanner smell is definitely noticeable, but eventually you quit smelling it. The pros: if you've gone a little overboard with it, you can remove it/take it down a notch by lightly scrubbing your overly tanned parts with a washcloth in the shower; it does not rub off on fabrics; it gradually fades away and doesn't get splotchy after bathing; it's not orange (on me) at all. The color takes a few hours to fully develop.

title: AWESOME TANNER
content: I was hesitant to buy this based on some of the negative reviews but saw someone on Tik Tok who recommended it. I am so happy I decided to purchase it! I purchased the Light version. I put two coats on before bed and washed off in the morning. I had the most beautiful tan. The tan lasts a long time and fades like a regular tan from the sun would. No blotchiness like some tanners leave. It just gradually faded and with just those 2 applications, my tan lasted almost 3 weeks. I am impressed and will definitely purchase this again when my bottle runs out. I don’t understand the negative reviews because I just love it. I’m also very fair skinned and it still worked to give me a beautiful tan! If you’re on the fence, just give it a try. Like I mentioned, I applied two coats before bed. I let the first one dry and then put on another coat and went to bed. In the morning, I showered and was left with the best tan ever.

title: Could not be more satisfied
content: I'm an extremely pale woman living in the PNW with fear of skin cancer, so sun is a rare commodity for me. I recently decided to try sunless tanning products and tried many that were streaky, orange, stinky, and just overall terrible. After using this product for the warm months (for my area this is April-August), these are my tips for using this product!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Exfoliate skin and shave as needed. Apply small amount of lotion to elbows, feet, hands, and knees to avoid splotchiness in those areas. Then apply onto dry skin (I found no lotion was best on the rest of my body until after the tan had dried, often the following morning). I started application on my legs and work my way up. It's best to apply this mousse with a mitt (I purchased mine off of Amazon as well). Apply in circles, making sure to massage into the skin and cover all areas. It's fairly easy to see spots you have missed since there is small color development immediately. I also used a makeup sponge to apply tan to my face. After that, I let it dry for 15-20 minutes, sans clothes. Although it's supposed to dry quicker than that, it really doesn't...especially if you use an average amount of product. I hated to put clothes on while still sticky so I would just go around business as usual until it dried satisfactorily. I would apply at night, let it dry, sleep in it, and then lotion in the morning. Not gonna lie, no fake tan smells great on the skin, and this product is no exception. However, I didn't find it totally offensive, and it was relatively easy to mask with a nice smelling lotion. There was very little transfer to clothes and not too much onto bed sheets. The color that did transfer washed out in the washing machine.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: It lasts for about 3 days depending on swimming, shaving, and showering. At day 4 it’s definitely time to reapply. There is only a slight smell, hardly worth mentioning. Other tanners have a much stronger smell. Love this and use it regularly.

title: Love it
content: Goes on so easily (highly recommend using with a mit!) and looks natural!

title: Verified Purchase

title: Easy application, quick dry, and blends nicely
content: Lasts 4-5 days, goes on easy and no streaking. I have naturally light-olive skin and was complimented on my tan!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: The color is very nice and the smell is what you would expect from a self tanner - it's fine. But as it is a mousse, no matter how evenly it is applied, the color is uneven. I had no issues with the self tanning lotion I used in the past (a generic from Walgreens) so I really think it is just the mousse texture. I will finish this bottle but I would not purchase again.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
